statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM patient_data WHERE appointment_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age ASC, appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT gender, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_data GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE cholesterol_level >= 200;
SELECT patient_id, checkup_date, blood_pressure FROM HealthRecords ORDER BY checkup_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;

SELECT patient_name, checkup_date, blood_pressure, cholesterol_level FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id WHERE HealthRecords.heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY checkup_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(cholesterol_level) AS average_cholesterol FROM HealthRecords GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1;

SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, MAX(cholesterol_level) AS highest_cholesterol, MIN(heart_rate) AS lowest_heart_rate FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT test_name, result, date_reported FROM LabResults WHERE result = 'Positive';
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, LabResults.test_name, LabResults.result FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON MedicalRecords.record_id = LabResults.record_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT patient_name, address, appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM lab_results ORDER BY result_date ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage FROM treatments WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, dosage FROM treatments WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM lab_results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender, address FROM patients ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name, mr.diagnosis, l.result FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id LEFT JOIN lab_results l ON mr.record_id = l.record_id;

SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, a.appointment_date, p.name AS patient_name FROM doctors d JOIN appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id JOIN patients p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE d.specialization = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY a.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT p.name, m.treatment FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING COUNT(m.record_id) > 1;
SELECT p.name, p.age, a.appointment_date, a.status FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
